com.kashenok.rentcar.database.dao

Class CarDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kashenok.rentcar.database.dao.AbstractDAO<Car>
      • com.kashenok.rentcar.database.dao.CarDAO

  • public class CarDAO
extends AbstractDAO<Car>
    The Class CarDAO. Perform actions with class Car objects and work with database.
